headline: Housing market: There are 'a lot' of reasons to be 'optimistic'
summary: Homebuilder stocks (XHB) rallied on Friday after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell signaled in his Jackson Hole speech the possibility of September interest rate cuts. However, some of the biggest names in the sector, like DR Horton (DHI), Lennar (LEN), Pultegroup (PHM), Toll Brothers (TOL), and Topbuild (BLD), are giving back some of Friday's gains. Additionally, mortgage rates hit a 10-month low of 6.58% last week, according to data from Freddie Mac (FMCC). Deutsche Bank senior US economist Brett Ryan and Redfin chief economist Daryl Fairweather join Market Catalysts with Allie Canal to discuss the current state of the housing market. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Reveals Over a Billion Dollars in Recent Trading, and This Dividend King Steel Stock Is on the List
summary: Berkshire recently bought shares of this leading steel stock.
